thread.title: Russell Reynolds Associates Hires Ted Moore

author: cnbc.com
title: Russell Reynolds Associates Hires Ted Moore
text:
CHICAGO, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Russell Reynolds Associates , a leading global search and leadership advisory firm, today announced that Ted Moore has joined the firm as a member of the Human Resources Officers Practice. Based in Chicago, Moore specializes across industries, with deep expertise in technology and business services, and advises clients on talent management, leadership development and succession planning.
"Ted brings over two decades of experience in the talent acquisition and leadership development space," said Constantine Alexandrakis, leader of Russell Reynolds Associates' U.S. Region. "His work focusing on diversity and inclusion in the hiring process, and his experience implementing change strategies for global organizations, will have an immediate impact on our clients as we help them craft and optimize diverse leadership teams."
Moore joins Russell Reynolds Associates from CDK Global, where he was VP of Integrated Talent Management, responsible for talent acquisition, leadership development and corporate responsibility. In this role, he designed and led a multifaceted talent culture strategy for the newly formed public company, a spinoff of ADP. Previously, Moore worked in progressively senior roles for ADP over the course of 14 years. He began his career as a Technical Recruiter for AG Consulting in San Francisco.
Moore holds a B.A. in English from the University of California, Santa Barbara.
About Russell Reynolds Associates
Russell Reynolds Associates is a global search and leadership advisory firm. Our 425+ consultants in 46 offices work with public, private and nonprofit organizations across all industries and regions. We help our clients build teams of transformational leaders who can meet today's challenges and anticipate the digital, economic and political trends that are reshaping the global business environment. From helping boards with their structure, culture and effectiveness to identifying, assessing and defining the best leadership for organizations â€“ our teams bring their decades of expertise to help clients solve their most complex leadership issues. www.russellreynolds.com
